remarks: A universal vertex, i.e. an element of the set of all universal vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.)
statement:
uvtxel $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) -> ( N e. ( V UnivVertex E ) <-> ( N e. V /\ A. k e. ( V \ { N } ) { k , N } e. ran E ) ) ) $.
$d E k $.
$d N k $.
$d V k $.
